title: University of Surrey — BEng Electronic Engineering (Placement Year)
summary: BEng (Hons) Electronic Engineering (Upper Second-Class Honours / 2:1). Modules included Machine Learning, Data Science, Computer Vision & Pattern Recognition, Robotics, Embedded Systems, Power Electronics, Nanoscience & Nanoparticles, Semiconductors & Optoelectronics. Societies included SamSoc, Volleyball, SVGS, ISA, DesiSoc.

title: University of Surrey — Electrical & Electronics Engineering Foundation Year
summary: Electrical and Electronics Engineering Foundation Year (Grade: First). Societies included SamSoc, Volleyball, SVGS, ISA, DesiSoc.

title: Ernest Bevin Academy — A-Levels
summary: A-Levels: Maths (B), Physics (C), Computer Science (C). Activities: Cricket.

title: Ernest Bevin Academy — GCSEs
summary: GCSEs: Maths (7), English Language (4), English Literature (5), Combined Science (6,5), Geography (4), Business Studies (D). Activities: Cricket, CCF, Football.
